19:55:36 | 王曉川 | 转一段，以前收藏的<br/><br/>PWAs deliver what is known as “an app-like experience”—with a web browser in full-screen mode you wouldn’t even know you’re working within a website. Still, many of the benefits of using a PWA don’t have to do with their features and functionality. Native apps are still more robust and can be written for any use. But PWAs were conceived as a way to sidestep, or even eliminate, a lot of the headaches associated with native app development
